long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Cow Clicker Game: Moo Your Way to Victory!**

Welcome to *Cow Clicker*, the ultimate idle clicker game where your favorite cow takes center stage! Tap, milk, and upgrade your way to farming greatness in this simple yet addictive game. Every click brings you closer to unlocking powerful upgrades, magical items, and fun surprises. Whether you're a casual gamer or a clicking enthusiast, *Cow Clicker* offers hours of moo-tastic entertainment!

**Features:**
- ğŸ„ **Click the Cow**: Tap your cow to earn points and build your farm empire!  
- ğŸŒŸ **Golden Cow & Magic Hay**: Unlock special items with passive effects to boost your points and speed.  
- ğŸ›ï¸ **Upgrade Shop**: Invest in upgrades to increase your passive income and watch your farm grow.  
- ğŸ‰ **Fun Animations**: Enjoy lively cow dances and surprise events as you play.  
- ğŸš€ **Idle Mechanics**: Earn points even while you're away!

Can you unlock all the upgrades and become the ultimate cow tycoon? Get ready to tap, moo, and conquer in *Cow Clicker*!
